code: import React from"react";import Tooltip from"@mui/material/Tooltip";import{styled}from"@mui/material/styles";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CustomTooltip=styled(Tooltip)(_ref=>{let{theme}=_ref;return{backgroundColor:"#000",borderRadius:"5px",color:"#fff",fontSize:"14px",fontFamily:["Castoro","cursive"],fontWeight:400,padding:"10px","& .MuiTooltip-arrow":{color:"#000",fontSize:9}};});export const InfoToolTip=_ref2=>{let{text,component}=_ref2;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CustomTooltip,{title:text,placement:"top",arrow:true,children:component});};
